attributes.action: Stop the use of electrical garden tools before 9AM
attributes.additional_details:
Sick of being rudely awoken by that ridiculous neighbour who thinks it's a wonderful idea to whip out the lawn mower or that pesky hedge trimmer before the sun is even in the sky? Tired of that extra five minutes of glorious splendour in bed being cruelly snatched away because that neighbour thinks it's okay to use such a loud instrument before 9AM?
This petition is to ban the use of such disruptive items before 9AM so that you can have a peaceful, gentle morning.
